Name Tutor/Concept/Function
Synopsis Part of the synopsis that describes function signatures introduced by this concept.
Syntax Function: MarkedText
Examples Here is an example for the readFile function:

Function: `str readFile(loc file) throws UnsupportedScheme(loc file), PathNotFound(loc file), IOError(str msg)`
